name: Mojito
about: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, mint, lime, sugar, and soda water.
steps_to_prepare: In a glass, muddle mint leaves and lime juice with sugar.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour rum over the ice and top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Martini
about: A classic cocktail made with gin and vermouth, garnished with an olive or lemon twist.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Pour gin and vermouth into the glass.
Stir well until chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive or lemon twist.

name: Cosmopolitan
about: A popular cocktail made with vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and fresh lime juice.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour vodka, cranberry juice, triple sec, and lime juice into the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

name: Margarita
about: A classic Mexican cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec.
steps_to_prepare: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with the lime wedge.
Dip the rim in salt to coat.
Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour tequila, lime juice, and triple sec into the shaker.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass over ice.

name: Pina Colada
about: A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a blender with ice cubes.
Add rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice to the blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Negroni
about: A classic Italian cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a mixing glass with ice cubes.
Pour gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth into the glass.
Stir well until chilled.
Strain into a chilled glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Old Fashioned
about: A classic cocktail made with bourbon, sugar, Angostura bitters, and a twist of citrus rind.
steps_to_prepare: Place the sugar cube in an old fashioned glass.
Add bitters and a splash of water.
Muddle until the sugar is dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour bourbon over the ice and stir well.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Daiquiri
about: A classic cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and simple syrup.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour rum, lime juice, and simple syrup into the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Whiskey Sour
about: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a shaker with ice cubes.
Pour whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup into the shaker.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon wheel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Gin and Tonic
about: A classic cocktail made with gin and tonic water, garnished with a lime wedge.
steps_to_prepare: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
Pour gin over the ice.
Top with tonic water.
Stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
